properties.areaDesc: Point Betsie to Sleeping Bear Point MI; Sleeping Bear Point to Grand Traverse Light MI; Manistee to Point Betsie MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 1 at 4:18AM EST until January 2 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 35 kt and highest waves around 8
feet expected.

* WHERE...Sleeping Bear Point to Grand Traverse Light MI, Point
Betsie to Sleeping Bear Point MI and Manistee to Point Betsie
MI.

* WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 6 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous highest waves which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM EST THURSDAY
